meanings.definition: A sumo wrestler of the highest rank.
meanings.sent1: The yokozuna won the tournament with his powerful moves.
meanings.sent2: In sumo wrestling, the yokozuna is revered for their skill and strength.
meanings.sent3: The yokozuna decided to try ballet, but his size made it comical.
meanings.sent4: He stood like a yokozuna, towering over his opponents with confidence.
meanings.sent5: The image of the yokozuna in his traditional attire was striking.

meanings.definition: The highest rank in sumo wrestling.
meanings.sent1: When a sumo wrestler reaches the yokozuna rank, it is a great honor.
meanings.sent2: The yokozuna title is earned through exceptional performance in the sport.
meanings.sent3: The yokozuna rank is like reaching the peak of a mountain in sumo wrestling.
meanings.sent4: In the world of sumo, becoming a yokozuna is like reaching the stars.
meanings.sent5: The yokozuna rank symbolizes the pinnacle of success in sumo wrestling.
